thread.title: Joey Methe
thread.title_full: KILL CLIFF reviewed by Joey Methe

author: Joey Methe
title: Joey Methe
text: This product tastes great and is the perfect size. I previously drank Starbucks double shots but always found them slightly too small to last on my ride to work in the morning. These are great, though not really sweet at all, for an avid espresso drinker such as myself who needs a zip in the morning.
